name: @appnest/masonry-layout
author: Appnest
description: An efficient and fast web component that gives you a beautiful masonry layout

scripts.git:add:commit:push: git add . && git commit --no-edit --amend --no-verify && git push
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.publish:patch: npm run bump:patch && npm run b:lib && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run bump:minor && npm run b:lib && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run bump:major && npm run b:lib && npm run publish
